Ref: CXP073/2023

Criteria:

  • B.Sc or B.Eng (Chemical) Qualification
  • Engineering Council of SA (ECSA) registration as a Candidate Engineer – advantageous
  • 3 – 5 year’s experience as a process engineer in water treatment, operations,
    turnkey projects or a similar field
  • Cooling tower chemistry and optimization experience will be advantageous
  • Dewatering equipment optimization and operation will be advantageous
  • Excellent organizational skills
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • Computer literacy – Google Workspace and Cloud computing.

Apply via website or alternatively, via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
